initialDialog.title: Welcome to the Application!
initialDialog.content: Would you like to take a quick tour to see the new features?

menuActions.title: Quick Actions
menuActions.description: Here you can find quick actions like theme and language switching, your user profile, and a way to report bugs.

lightSwitch.title: Light Switch
lightSwitch.description: Easily toggle between light and dark mode.

themeSwitch.title: Theme Switch
themeSwitch.description: Choose from various themes to personalize your experience.

textSwitch.title: Language Selection
textSwitch.description: Change the application language and text size at any time from this menu.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Access your profile settings and preferences here.

bugReport.title: Report a Bug
bugReport.description: Encountered an issue? Use this button to quickly report bugs and help us improve the application.

backendErrorBanner.title: Backend Service Issues Detected
backendErrorBanner.message: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Your work is saved locally and will be synced when the service recovers. Please try again later.

timeout.detail: Backend is not responding. Your changes are saved locally.

serverError.detail: A server error occurred, but your changes are saved locally.

error.genericError: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

police.title: Offer Application for Company Insurance
police.description: Insurance coverage for occupational and non-occupational accidents as well as occupational diseases according to the Federal Law on Accident Insurance (UVG)

policiert.title: Quote has been issued
policiert.description: The quote has been issued and is read-only. No further changes can be made.

rejected.title: Quote was rejected
rejected.description: This quote was rejected and is read-only. No further changes can be made.

offertantrag.vttRejected: Offer application cannot be printed because the quote was rejected by VTT.
offertantrag.checklistMissing: Offer application cannot be printed because the checklist is not fully completed.
